title: oklch()
description: The `oklch()` CSS function specifies a color using the Oklch color space, specifying lightness, chroma and hue for more perceptually uniform colors.
content: The color function that specifies a color in the Oklch color space, which is based on lightness, chroma and hue. It's useful for fine-tuning colors with precise control over their appearance. It offers a more intuitive way to adjust colors while maintaining consistency and harmony.
